actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to remove the price controls on certain natural gas produced after April 1981.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to provide that, effective April, 1981, price controls for natural gas shall not apply to the sale of natural gas which is: (1) produced from any new well more than 2.5 miles from the nearest marker well; (2) subject to stated exceptions, produced from a reservoir from which natural gas was not produced before April, 1981, in commercial quantities; (3) high-cost natural gas; or (4) stripper well gas produced from a new well.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to remove the price controls on certain natural gas produced after April 1981.
